headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://www.gstatic.com https://www.google.com https://apis.google.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://lh3.googleusercontent.com; font-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://securetoken.googleapis.com https://www.googleapis.com https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com https://firestore.googleapis.com https://apis.google.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.google.com https://www.gstatic.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'
